Chinese  Mondays 12PM-1PM & Thursdays 1PM-2PM             French  Fridays 12PM-1PM             German  Wednesdays 12PM-1PM             Japanese  Thursdays 4PM-5PM             Spanish  Thursdays 2PM-3PM              Events           Schedule of Events    Conversation Hours     Chinese Conversation Hour    French Conversation Hour    German Conversation Hour (SprachCafe)    Japanese Conversation Hour    Spanish Conversation Hour      Film Series     Ancient World, Modern Media    Soviet and Russian Film Club (Клуб советского и русского кино)      Special Events             Film Series  Interested in attending a Film Series event in your favorite language? Check the schedule here! All film screenings are available to the public, and we provide tea, coffee, & fresh popcorn too!      Peer Tutoring  Find out more about our Peer Tutoring program, meet the tutors, and view schedules for Spanish, Italian, French, and German Peer Tutoring in GH 305 & GH 308!      Today's Events  See what Conversations Hours, Film Series, and special events are happening today in GH 308!      Contact Us  Do you want to schedule an event in the Language Oasis? Do you need help with a technology tool or want to schedule a workshop? Contact us with any questions you may have!
